channel.title: Comments on: Mutapa Empire
channel.description: A detailed history of the Shona people of Zimbabwe

item.title: By: S musunhe
item.dc:creator: S musunhe
item.description: I am a moyo dhewa, and I have never heard of these white skinned peolpe with red hair and green eyes, where are you getting your information from?
item.content:encoded: I am a moyo dhewa, and I have never heard of these white skinned peolpe with red hair and green eyes, where are you getting your information from?

item.title: By: Franklin Mukarakte
item.dc:creator: Franklin Mukarakte
item.description: The Moyo muzukuru detembo requires editing as there is an omission of the great ancestor called "Nyamita"
item.content:encoded: The Moyo muzukuru detembo requires editing as there is an omission of the great ancestor called “Nyamita”
